attributes.action: Why are the British public suffering financially to house economic migrants?
attributes.additional_details:
The British public need your support !! We are watching our utility bills, fuel costs..food costs.
Where's our help??
attributes.background:
Why are we paying 7 million pounds a DAY..to house economic migrants in hotels when the British public are suffering with rising food..gas..electricity..petrol..diesel costs.!!!
It cost an average of £100 a day to house an economic asylum seeker!
Where's our help?

rejection.details:
We are not sure what specific action you would like Government to take. We understand you would like to see more financial assistance for energy bills, food and fuel, but it's not clear what additional financial help you would like to see.

You can read about the Government's cost of living support and if you are eligible for financial support here: https://www.gov.uk/cost-of-living

You could start a new petition calling on the Government to fund additional support for something which is not already covered by the support package.
